mapper.select: select id, nickname, evaluation, reg_date, category, subject, meet_date, location from (select *, row_number() over (order by id) as num from board natural join user b1 where not view_option = 0 and ) as b2 where num between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}
SELECT * FROM board where id = #{id} and not view_option = 0
mapper.insert: insert into board(email, subject, content, reg_date, view_option, category, location, meet_date, modify_date) values(#{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, now(), #{viewOption}, #{category}, #{location}, #{meetDate}, now())
mapper.update: update board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, location = #{location}, meet_date = #{meetDate}, modify_date = now() where id = #{id}
update board set view_option = 0 where id = #{id}
